import React, { useRef,useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const EditDepartment = () => { const refcls=useRef(null) const updateData=()=>{ refcls.current.click() } const {id}=useParams(); const [formData,setFormData]=useState({ deptname:"", deptid:"", }) const [dept,setDept]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/editDept/${id}`) .then(resul) .catch((error)=>{ }) },[id]) const handelSubmit=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); } return ( <>
Edit Department
); }; export default EditDepartment;
